/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees and bushes, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. A large archway stands as a prominent feature on the right side of the street, adding a touch of architectural interest to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the archway and the expansive sky.
